title: Extract Transcriber interface + config refactor
description: Refactor transcribe package to use an interface. Rename files, add TranscribeConfig to config, update main.go factory. Pure refactoring, no behavior change.
close_reason: Extracted Transcriber interface, renamed files, added TranscribeConfig with backward compat, updated main.go factory and banner, all tests pass

title: Polish & edge cases
description: Add minimum recording duration check (skip if <0.5s), max recording duration handling (warn if >30s), first-run config creation, structured logging with slog, --version flag. Final end-to-end testing.
close_reason: Task 8 complete: slog, --version, min/max duration guards, first-run config, test cleanup

title: Global hotkey listener (gohook)
description: Create internal/hotkey package wrapping robotn/gohook for global keyboard event listening. Supports two modes: hold-to-talk (key down=start, key up=stop) and toggle (first press=start, second press=stop). Returns event channel and cancel function. Configurable key combination. Requires macOS Accessibility permission.
close_reason: Hotkey listener complete: NewListener with hold/toggle modes, Events() channel, Stop() cleanup. Manual test binary at cmd/test-hotkey.

title: TDT greedy decode loop
description: Implement core TDT greedy decode algorithm in pure Go. Orchestrates Decoder and JointDecision models with LSTM state management, duration bins, and max-symbols-per-step guard.
close_reason: All three tasks implemented with TDD, 21 new tests passing

title: Main application integration
description: Wire all components together in cmd/gostt-writer/main.go. Config loading with --config flag, component initialization, main event loop (hotkey -> record -> transcribe in goroutine -> inject), signal handling for graceful shutdown, startup logging, permission error detection with helpful messages.
close_reason: Main integration complete: CLI flags, config loading, component init, event loop (hotkey->record->transcribe->inject), signal handling, startup banner. Build and tests pass. Clean shutdown verified.

title: Vocabulary loader + token decoder
description: Implement loading parakeet_vocab.json and converting token IDs to text using SentencePiece conventions.
close_reason: All three tasks implemented with TDD, 21 new tests passing

title: Parakeet transcriber - wire CoreML models
description: Connect CoreML bridge, vocabulary, and decode loop into ParakeetTranscriber struct. Load 4 CoreML models, implement Process method with full inference pipeline.
close_reason: Implemented ParakeetTranscriber with full CoreML inference pipeline (commit 8d5a66e)

title: Configuration system (YAML)
description: Create internal/config package with Config struct, YAML loading, defaults, path expansion, and validation. Config lives at ~/.config/gostt-writer/config.yaml. Supports: model_path, hotkey (keys + mode), audio (sample_rate + channels), inject (method), log_level. TDD with unit tests.
close_reason: Config package complete with 12 passing tests

title: Audio recorder (malgo/miniaudio)
description: Create internal/audio package wrapping malgo for microphone capture. Records audio as []float32 at 16kHz mono (what Whisper expects). Interface: NewRecorder(sampleRate, channels), Start(), Stop() []float32, Close(). malgo uses CoreAudio on macOS - zero external deps. Include integration test with build tag.
close_reason: Audio recorder complete with 5 passing tests

title: Text injection (robotgo)
description: Create internal/inject package wrapping robotgo for typing text into active application. Supports two methods: 'type' (robotgo.Type - keystroke simulation, preserves clipboard) and 'paste' (robotgo.WriteAll + Cmd+V - fast but overwrites clipboard). Default is 'type'. Requires macOS Accessibility permission.
close_reason: Text injection complete: type mode (robotgo.Type) and paste mode (clipboard + Cmd+V) with clipboard preservation. Manual test binary at cmd/test-inject.

title: End-to-end validation
description: Final integration testing with both whisper and parakeet backends. Verify backward compat with old-style config. Full test suite pass.
close_reason: Parakeet TDT e2e validation passes â€” JFK audio correctly transcribed

title: Config example, README, polish
description: Update config.example.yaml with transcribe section, update README with Parakeet backend docs, update main.go startup banner.

title: Vendor CoreML bridge from go-coreml
description: Copy minimal CoreML bridge (~500 lines ObjC/Go) from gomlx/go-coreml into internal/coreml/. Self-contained package with CGo bindings to Foundation + CoreML frameworks.
close_reason: All three tasks implemented with TDD, 21 new tests passing

title: Project scaffolding & build system
description: Initialize Go module, add whisper.cpp as submodule, create Makefile with targets (whisper, model, build, run, clean), build whisper.cpp with Metal + Accelerate, download ggml-base.en.bin model, create minimal main.go, verify build compiles.
close_reason: Scaffolding complete: go.mod, Makefile, whisper.cpp submodule, model downloaded, binary builds and runs

title: Whisper transcription wrapper
description: Create internal/transcribe package wrapping whisper.cpp official Go bindings. Loads model once at startup, exposes Process([]float32) -> (string, error). Requires go.mod replace directive pointing to third_party/whisper.cpp/bindings/go. Build requires C_INCLUDE_PATH and LIBRARY_PATH set to whisper.cpp build artifacts. Test with JFK sample WAV.
close_reason: Transcriber wrapper complete: NewTranscriber loads model, Process transcribes float32 audio via whisper.cpp, 4 tests passing (JFK sample correctly transcribed in 0.42s)

title: Makefile + model download
description: Add parakeet-model download target to Makefile. Update build targets for CoreML framework linking.
